@graph.name: RetroSynthesis
@graph.description:
Generating theoretical possible pathways for the production of Lycopene in E.Coli using Retrosynthesis tools

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Generating theoretical possible pathways for the production of Lycopene in E.Coli using Retrosynthesis tools](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/synthetic-biology/tutorials/retrosynthesis_analysis/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
